This field can only contain letters, num: This field can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens (-), underscores (_), and colons (:).
Enable horizontal scrolling, to make vie: Enable horizontal scrolling, to make viewing tables with many columns easier.
Enable the table information display, wi: Enable the table information display, with information about the currently visible data, like the number of rows.
Allow the visitor to change the number o: Allow the visitor to change the number of rows shown when using pagination.
Enable pagination of the table (viewing: Enable pagination of the table (viewing only a certain number of rows at a time) by the visitor.
Enable the visitor to filter or search t: Enable the visitor to filter or search the table. Only rows with the search word in them are shown.
Enable sorting of the table by the visit: Enable sorting of the table by the visitor.
Additional CSS classes for styling purpo: Additional CSS classes for styling purposes can be entered here.
Highlight a row while the mouse cursor h: Highlight a row while the mouse cursor hovers above it by changing its background colour.
The background colors of consecutive row: The background colours of consecutive rows will alternate.
Combining consecutive cells within the s: Combining consecutive cells within the same column is called “rowspanning”.
Combining consecutive cells within the same row is called “colspanning”.
Table cells can span across more than on: Table cells can span across more than one column or row.
The Table ID can only consist of letters: The Table ID can only consist of letters, numbers, hyphens (-), and underscores (_).
You can not delete all table columns!: You cannot delete all table columns!
You can not delete all table rows!: You cannot delete all table rows!
This field must contain a positive numbe: This field must contain a positive number.
Do you really want to delete this table?: Do you really want to delete this table?
Do you really want to delete these tables?
